sentences.cn: 而况又是过期不见回来.

sentences.en: I'll go home and pay an overdue visit to my mother.
sentences.cn: 我将回家看望母亲，其实我早该回去了。

sentences.en: Now they are overdue and I shall have to pay a fine.
sentences.cn: 现在他们过期了,我不得不付罚款.

sentences.en: Overdue notices are usually produced on a line - printer.
sentences.cn: 过期通知单往往在行 式 打印机上制作.

sentences.en: The aircraft is overdue by several hours.
The baby was a week overdue (= it was expected to be born a week ago ).
sentences.cn: 宝宝超过预产期有一周了。

sentences.en: The book is overdue. You'll have to renew it.
sentences.cn: 书已过期, 你得续借.

sentences.en: The book you borrowed is overdue.
The computer is even able to send out overdue notices.
sentences.cn: 计算机甚至还能发出图书逾期通知单.

sentences.en: The landlady is angry because the rent is overdue.
sentences.cn: 女房东生气了,因为房租过期未付.

sentences.en: The library called in all overdue books.
sentences.cn: 图书馆要求把所有逾期未还的书收回.

sentences.en: The plane is overdue and has been delayed by the bad weather.
sentences.cn: 飞机晚点了,被坏天气耽搁了.

sentences.en: The train is two hours overdue.
The two sisters apparently bashed each other up when their long overdue reconciliation turned sour.
sentences.cn: 显然，这姐妹俩早就无法再互相迁就，索性厮打起来。

sentences.en: We recognize your financial problems, but your account is overdue.
sentences.cn: 我们知道你的财政问题, 但你的帐户是过期的.

phrases.tran_cn: 逾期未支付款；过期付款

trans.tran_cn: 过期的，延误的，迟到的，未兑的，早应完成的
trans.tran_en: not done, paid, returned etc by the time expected
